title: Vicky's Mozzarella & Pesto Stuffed Chicken wrapped in Parma Ham
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts', '180g jar red pesto (of your choice chilli, red pepper etc.)', '1 ball mozzarella (thinly sliced), 3 slices per breast', '8 slices Parma ham (2 slices per chicken breast)', 'sprinkle chilli flakes (optional)', 'pepper to taste (optional)']
